and CM1000 cable modems?'' on '''Netgear'''] :Multi-Gig Internet support via [https://kb.netgear.com/000060393/How-do-I-set-up-Ethernet-port-aggregation-between-my-NETGEAR-Nighthawk-CM1100-Multi-gig-Speed-Cable-Modem-and-NETGEAR-Nighthawk-AX8-router Ethernet Link Aggregation].
